attributes.action: Stamp out middle lane hogging. Adhere to the highway code. Save lives, emissions and congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One lane empty. Two lanes full. The carbon cost of forcing unnecessary overtaking should be obvious. The emissions avoidable must be made a priority, as must the cost to the nation in terms of under-use of a valuable resource, the nearside lane. One third of our arterial road structure is wasted due to ineducation in basic motorway etiquette. A short, sharp campaign would save very many lives lost by impatience and billions on road-building and fuel wastage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
